           0x43 hexadecimal converts to              67 decimal
           0123       octal converts to              83 decimal
             65     decimal converts to              65 decimal
              0     decimal converts to               0 decimal
        -0x40c3     decimal converts to               0 decimal
          -0456     decimal converts to            -456 decimal
           -456     decimal converts to            -456 decimal
           0789       octal converts to               7 decimal
           0.25       octal converts to               0 decimal
abc is not an integer
#123 is not an integer
